description:
Simplify your running kit. With their one piece design, the High Point shorts use an integrated mesh liner, so you only have one thing to put on, one thing to wash, and one thing to pack. You won’t need to choose whether you take your phone or a gel, these shorts have 5 pockets, so you have plenty of room. And, all the pockets sit right below the waist band, so they don’t bounce around with your stride.

  • Ripstop front panel is UPF 30+, protecting you from more than 95% of harsh UV
  • DWR finish on the front panel shakes off light rain and trail muck
  • Mesh liner wicks away moisture, promotes airflow, and reduces the chafing
  • Stretch panels and a notched side split offer a huge range of movement
  • Plenty of pocket space, with 4 drop-in pockets and 1 zippered pocket
  • Elasticized waist and external drawcord let you cinch in the perfect fit
  • Run-Ready fit means these shorts stay put when on the move, no bunching or riding up
name: Brooks High Point 3" 2-in-1 Shorts - Women's
